definition: to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: I burnt some joss papers and pray to the examination god.
sentences.chinese: 我烧了一些金纸，祈求上帝的考试。

sentences.english: He didn't pray for Catherine's soul to haunt him.
sentences.chinese: 他也不祈求凯瑟琳的魂牵梦萦。

sentences.english: I leave uncultivated today, was precisely yesterday perishes tomorrow which person of the body implored.
sentences.chinese: 我旷费的今天，正是昨天殒身之人祈求的明日。

sentences.english: I want to pray to God with my utmost sincere heart and I am willing to sacrifice my life to plead God for rain.
sentences.chinese: 我要用最虔诚的心向天神祷告，愿舍身祈求上天降雨。

sentences.english: One day, his aunt came to beg for forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 一日，密勒日巴的姑母前来祈求原谅。

sentences.english: I wasted today, was precisely yesterday perishes person of the body implored.
sentences.chinese: 我荒废的今日，正是昨日殒身之人祈求的明日。

sentences.english: Seeking good fortune at the Che Kung Festival Fair.
sentences.chinese: 市民在车公诞市场选购风车祈求好运。

sentences.english: The Uzbek soldiers claimed mercy from Genghis Khan.
sentences.chinese: 这些乌兹别克士兵祈求成吉思汗的宽恕。

sentences.english: He asked specifically that God might reveal both the dream and its meaning.
sentences.chinese: 他明确祈求神显明梦的内容和梦的含意。

sentences.english: The altissima triumph is smile on the zenith of destiny.
sentences.chinese: 唯一所祈求的胜利，仅是站在命运的巅峰，微笑。

sentences.english: So as I pray, Unlimited water Works.
sentences.chinese: 故如我祈求，无限之水制。

sentences.english: We’re all just begging to stay in our homes, basically.
sentences.chinese: 我们所祈求的只是最基本的，能够留在自己的家里。

sentences.english: In short, the Father never denied his Son any request.
sentences.chinese: 总而言之，父神从来没推却祂儿子任何一个的祈求。

sentences.english: The owners burn it in metal cans in front of their stores and pray for good business.
sentences.chinese: 他们在商店前的铁桶里烧纸钱，祈求好财运。

sentences.english: I'll pray to God for your safety.
Who found favour before God, and desired to find a tabernacle for the God of Jacob.
sentences.chinese: 大卫在神面前蒙恩，祈求为雅各的神豫备居所。

definition: to hope/to wish/hope/wish/(old) name of an official post
to seek for/to hope to gain/desirous
to pray/to pray for sth/to wish sth/prayer/wish
to expect/to look forward to/anxious for sth/to hope (to get sth)
